translation.en: [narrator] Ah, Winchester University.
translation.ko: "검토하게 된다는 점이다 - 제임스 볼드윈" 윈체스터 대학교군요

translation.en: Hello.
The writers of this program are depending on my ethnic but nonthreatening voice
translation.ko: 이 프로그램의 작가들은 그들이 게으른 탓에 설명하지 못한 것들을

translation.en: to explain things they are too lazy to set up traditionally.
translation.ko: 설명하지 못한 것들을 나의 민족적이지만 비위협적인 목소리로 설명합니다

translation.en: Only two months into the semester, and already the ninth Ivy League's quads buzz
translation.ko: 학기 시작 후 2개월이 지난 지금 다양한 동아리들이 모인 가운데

translation.en: with future Olympians and presidents,
with innovators trying to crack the next Facebook,
with diverse students being forced into group shots
translation.ko: 입학 안내서에 실릴 단체 사진을 억지로 찍으며

translation.en: -for the admissions brochure. -[camera shutter clicks]
One of Winchester's most well-known groups is the humor magazine Pastiche,
translation.ko: 윈체스터의 가장 유명한 동아리 중 하나는 유머 잡지 '패스티시'로

translation.en: whose members have left their mark as satirists,
translation.ko: 멤버들은 풍자 작가나 TV 작가가 되어

translation.en: television writers, and most recently...
hosts of a blackface party.
[man] Yeah!
[narrator] Ah, look, Serena Williams.
-That's an actual Black person. -[cell phone camera shutter clicks]
That's... I guess Nicki Minaj? I'm not sure.
Even more blackface.
Apparently this is a thing that white children are into.
translation.ko: 이런 건 백인 애들이 좋아하는 거랍니다

translation.en: Google it.
If you couldn't tell, there's lots more going on at this party...
translation.ko: 사실 이 파티에선 눈에 보이는 것보다

translation.en: -[cheering] -[narrator] ...than meets the eye.
Oh, more actual Black people. I wonder if they'll find this amusing.
translation.ko: 진짜 흑인들이 또 왔네요 이런 걸 재밌어할지 궁금해요

translation.en: -[woman] How dare you? -[man] This is bullshit.
-[man] What the hell is this? -[woman] You are not Beyoncé. -[screaming] -[glass shatters]
[narrator] They do not.
[man] Everyone back in the house right now! Drinks down!
[narrator] Unpacking this egregious event will take some time,
translation.ko: 이 지독한 사건을 수습하려면 시간이 좀 걸리겠지만

translation.en: but an excellent place to begin our saga is with Samantha White,
translation.ko: 우리의 이야기는 서맨사 화이트와 함께 시작됩니다

translation.en: a junior media studies major and local provocateur.
Slavery in America.
Anybody like to volunteer to lead the discussion?
[narrator] As one of the few Black faces in this mostly white place...
-[man] Anyone? -[narrator] ...Sam had become
used to episodes like this...
[man] Anyone with some special connection to the material?
translation.ko: 이 주제에 특별히 연관이 있는 사람?

translation.en: [narrator] ...and run-ins like these.
You look like Beyoncé.
Storm from the X-Men.
Wait, what are you?
[narrator] Sam had enough and took to Winchester's syndicated student radio station.
translation.ko: 참다못한 샘은 윈체스터의 학생 연합 방송국으로 갔어요

translation.en: Dear white people, here's a little tip.
translation.ko: 친애하는 백인 여러분 조언 하나 할게요

translation.en: When you ask someone who looks ethnically different, "What are you?"
translation.ko: 다른 인종처럼 보이는 사람에게 '넌 뭐니?'라고 물었을 때

translation.en: the answer is usually, "A person about to slap the shit out of you."
translation.ko: 답은 보통 '곧 너한테 귀싸대기를 때릴 사람이다'예요

translation.en: [narrator] While Sam's show, aptly titled Dear White People,
translation.ko: 재치 있게 제목을 붙인 샘의 쇼 '친애하는 백인 여러분'은

translation.en: garnered a diverse set of listeners...
Who is this chick?
translation.ko: 다양한 청취자들을 확보했으며 이 여자애 누구야?

translation.en: [narrator] ...others was butthurt.
translation.ko: "실종 - 흑인 문화" 열 받는 사람들도 있었죠

translation.en: Keeping with its vow to mock anyone deemed too self-important,
translation.ko: 자신이 최고라는 사람들을 조롱하자는 신조를 지키며

translation.en: Pastiche set out to take down Samantha White
by throwing a politically incorrect party
for all those burdened by her demands
translation.ko: "실종 - 언론의 자유" 부담스러워하는 이들을 위한 파티였죠

translation.en: for racial sensitivity.
However, after pressure from the administration,
-the party was canceled. -[electronic beep]
But somehow, unbeknownst to Pastiche,
an invite went out anyway.
And it is here we find Sam and her camera,
at the epicenter of one of the biggest scandals to hit Winchester so far.
translation.ko: 윈체스터 역사상 최대 스캔들의 진원지에 말이죠

translation.en: And like most parties, the hangover from this one...
translation.ko: 다른 파티처럼 다음 날 아침의 숙취는...

translation.en: is a motherfucker.
Dear white people, here's a list of acceptable Halloween costumes:
translation.ko: 친애하는 백인 여러분 용인되는 핼러윈 의상 명단이에요

translation.en: a pirate, slutty nurse, any of our first 43 presidents.
Top of the list of unacceptable costumes: me.
translation.ko: 용인되지 않는 의상 중 첫 번째는 '나'예요

translation.en: Winchester couldn't get through 2017 without blackface? ♪ 'Cause I really don't care ♪
Oh, I'm sorry. Am I being too loud for you?
You know I stay woke, Sam,
but right now, I'm getting the tea
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 잘록한 허리와 빵빵한 엉덩이를 위해

translation.en: on how to be waist thin and ass thick
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 잘록한 허리와 빵빵한 엉덩이를 위해 텍사스 백인 년이 추천한 차를 마시고 있어

translation.en: from this white bitch in Texas.
translation.ko: 텍사스 백인 년이 추천한 차를 마시고 있어

translation.en: Okay, one, you're gorge.
translation.ko: 텍사스 백인 년이 추천한 차를 마시고 있어 첫째, 넌 예뻐

translation.en: And, two, is "white bitch in Texas" her government name?
Her name's Marian Updike, and she's the founder
of the Think Slim online course,
and she be dropping the knowledge I need to drop my sophomore 16.
translation.ko: 2학년으로서 알아야 할 것들을 다 알려 주고 있다고

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Not a thing.
[woman] I'm learning how to enjoy a decadent McRib.
translation.ko: 지금 맥립 즐기는 법을 배우고 있어

translation.en: Miss Updike told me to cut it into fourths and count my chews.
translation.ko: "목소리 섹시해! - 가벼운 사이" 업다이크가 4조각으로 잘라 먹고 씹는 횟수를 세랬어

translation.en: Thirty, by the way.
[Sam] I can't with you, and what's more, I won't.
translation.ko: 난 못 해 아니, 안 할래

translation.en: -[woman chuckles] -Look. For those of you who thought our ivory tower
was immune to this type of shit...
-[alarm ringing] -[man] Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
Okay, I'm pretty sure the McRib was invented by Republicans in the '80s
translation.ko: 맥립은 보나 마나 80년대의 공화당원이 만들었을 거야

translation.en: to destroy Black communities, along with crack and Jerry Springer.
translation.ko: 마약과 제리 스프링어와 함께 흑인 사회를 파괴하려고 말야

translation.en: Suck it, Reagan. I'm still here.
And please know that I will be showing up on McRib day
translation.ko: 그리고 맥립 데이에 셜리 치좀 티셔츠 입고

translation.en: in a Shirley Chisholm T-shirt sans internal conflict.
Is McRib day a thing?
Where are you getting these Shirley Chisholm T-shirts?
translation.ko: 셜리 치좀 티셔츠는 어디서 구할 거야?

translation.en: Forever 21. Girl, you know I have no shame. -Well... -[cell phone buzzing]
-Aside from my one secret shame. -Only one?
translation.ko: - 비밀 하나만 빼고 - 하나? "당장 와 - 가벼운 사이"

translation.en: Sam, I've been secretly streaming The Cosby Show.
My conscience? Riddled with guilt.
[Sam] It's just really convenient that this all came out once white people realized
translation.ko: 코스비가 NBC를 살 만큼 부자란 사실이 밝혀지자마자

translation.en: he was rich enough to buy NBC.
I mean, he probably did that shit. I'm just saying.
translation.ko: 아마 그런 짓 한 건 맞겠지만 말야

translation.en: Yeah, probably.
All right, y'all. Five minutes left for call-ins. Give me your worst.
[man] I find your show offensive and highly divisive.
We need to come together at times like this.
[Sam] Are you a white male? [man] Why? Race is a social construct.
translation.ko: - 백인 남자인가요? - 왜요? 인종은 사회 구성물이죠

translation.en: [Sam] I'll take that as a yes. Look, I didn't create the divide.
translation.ko: 백인 맞는 거 같네요 난 분열을 조장한 적 없어요

translation.en: I'm just calling attention to it.
[woman] "Dear White People"?
Even you have to admit your show comes off aggressive.
translation.ko: 자기 쇼가 공격적이란 건 본인도 알 거예요

translation.en: [Sam] Dear White People is a misnomer.
My show is meant to articulate the feelings of a misrepresented group
translation.ko: 내 쇼는 주류 사회에서 왜곡된 소수 집단의 감정을

translation.en: outside the majority.
I get it.
The realization that you contribute to a racist society can be unsettling,
translation.ko: 그쪽이 인종 차별적인 사회에 기여한다는 깨달음은 불편하겠지만

translation.en: but you sound like a grown-ass woman to me.
Next.
Listen, the man could take an episode about Rudy getting a B-minus
and stretch it into a half hour of comedic gold.
Oh, God, I pray he didn't stretch little Rudy out in any other way.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 제발 다른 건 승화시키지 않았으면 해

translation.en: -Bitch, you going to hell. -I'll save you a seat.
translation.ko: - 너 지옥에나 가 - 네 자리 맡아 둘게

translation.en: [man] Thanks for saying what we're all thinking.
translation.ko: 우리 생각을 대신 말해 줘서 고마워요

translation.en: Sometimes, I feel like I don't belong on my own campus.
translation.ko: 가끔 난 학교에서도 이방인이 된 것 같아요

translation.en: [Sam] Right?
translation.ko: 그렇죠? 우릴 입학시켜 준 게 스스로 너무 기특한가 봐요

translation.en: They too busy patting themselves on the back for letting us in.
translation.ko: 그렇죠? 우릴 입학시켜 준 게 스스로 너무 기특한가 봐요 "암스트롱-파커 하우스 역사적인 흑인 기숙사"

translation.en: Hey, thanks for hanging out during the show.
translation.ko: "암스트롱-파커 하우스 역사적인 흑인 기숙사" 쇼 하는 동안 같이 있어 줘서 고마워

translation.en: You give me shit, but if I wasn't there to talk about the McRib...
translation.ko: 날 구박해도 내가 맥립 얘기 해 주지 않았다면...

translation.en: Shit would get way too real for a Monday morning.
[chuckles] I got you, always. We chilling before Black Caucus?
translation.ko: 언제든 도와줄게 블랙 코커스 가기 전에 볼까?

translation.en: -I got plans. -Hmm.
Dick-related plans? Ain't nobody got time for no dick.
translation.ko: - 남자랑 연관된 거야? - 남자 만날 시간 없어

translation.en: Not even Reggie's?
He's coming over here.
Anyway, I gotta cut my footage for doc class.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 난 다큐 편집 숙제해야 해

translation.en: Just text me when you're going down.
Hmm, how about you text me when you're done going down, mm-kay?
translation.ko: 네가 일 다 보고 나한테 문자 보내, 알았지?

translation.en: You...
-What's up, Sam? -Hey. 'Sup, Reggie?
So, uh, what you up to?
Did you, uh...
[laughs] Twice.
What?
That's such an unfair advantage.
What are you doing?
Uh, crushing candy. -Right after? -Mm-hmm.
What level are you on?
No, no, no, no, no.
-Absolutely not. -What?
You're supposed to spread all this jelly, you know.
-Ew. -It's not "ew."
translation.ko: 젤리는 다 퍼뜨려야 해 그게 아니라니까 그렇게 해야 이길 수 있어

translation.en: It's imperative to the game. Look.
translation.ko: 그게 아니라니까 그렇게 해야 이길 수 있어

translation.en: -Come here. Okay. -[clears throat]
Look, this is why you're still stuck on level 20.
translation.ko: 이래서 네가 아직도 레벨 20에서 못 올라가는 거야

translation.en: Yeah? Spreading this digital goo.
This is one of the most pressing issues of our time.
Okay, you gonna give me my phone back, though.
What? No.
-Gabe. -What? Give me my phone back.
I don't know what you're talking about.
-Gabe. -No.
[Gabe] You're so silly.
What? You want this?
translation.ko: 왜? 이걸 원해? 이거 싫어? 싫어?

translation.en: -You don't want it? -Mnh-mnh. -No? -[laughing]
[Gabe] You think you're so slick. Okay, no, no, no, no. -No, no. -What? What?
translation.ko: - 네가 똑똑한 줄 알지? - 안 돼, 안 돼

translation.en: Stop, you're gonna mess up my hair.
-Huh? -Like, more.
Yeah, I am.
I'm gonna mess up that hair like a light drizzle on a much too humid day.
translation.ko: 습한 날 이슬비 맞은 머리처럼 망가뜨릴 거야

translation.en: -[phone buzzing] -[laughing]
[clears throat] Reggie wants you.
[groans] Shit.
I'm supposed to represent for the BSU at this caucus.
Reggie's a...
Reggie's a cool guy.
Yeah, except for when he corners you with a "'Sup?"
Or a "So..." Ellipses implied.
translation.ko: '그래서...' 하며 말을 흐릴 때 빼곤 괜찮지

translation.en: You guys gonna talk about the party? What else?
Man, it's just so fucked.
You know I could, uh-- I could come with.
No, it's cool. It's, um... It's members only.
So... you're a shark.
-That's cool. I get that. -[chuckles]
You know, you're always moving, and you only slow down to kill...
translation.ko: 항상 움직이다가 죽일 때만 속도를 늦추지

translation.en: Gabe, I know how analogies work.
I guess what I'm saying is, you know, it's, uh...
You know, romance in a place like this,
it's been reduced to, like, hooking up, you know?
translation.ko: 이런 장소에서 로맨스는 의미가 퇴색돼 - 하룻밤 상대로 말야 - 로맨스

translation.en: Mm, romance.
[Gabe] It doesn't exist here.
I want to be more than just a hot lay for you, Sam.
translation.ko: 난 화끈한 잠자리 상대로만 남고 싶지 않아

translation.en: Yeah. All right.
What CW show are we in?
You know what I'm trying to say.
translation.ko: 지금 아동용 드라마 찍어? 내 말뜻 알잖아

translation.en: You want more. Yeah.
I gotta go get a shower. So...
-Later, gator. -[chuckles]
[Sam] Lionel Higgins, right? Um, yes.
From the Winchester Independent. Covering this meeting.
translation.ko: 윈체스터 인디펜던트에서 이 모임을 취재하러 왔는데

translation.en: I just need someone to give me the lay of the land.
translation.ko: 누가 얘기 좀 해 줬으면 해

translation.en: [Sam] Sure.
translation.ko: 누가 얘기 좀 해 줬으면 해 그래, 네가 파티를 취소시키자는 기사를 썼지?

translation.ko: 그래, 네가 파티를 취소시키자는 기사를 썼지?

translation.en: Yeah.
Why haven't we heard of you before? [Lionel] I'm not that notable.
translation.ko: - 왜 네 이름을 처음 듣지? - 난 눈에 띄는 타입이 아니거든

translation.en: Something tells me that's not true.
Well, generally speaking,
Black Caucus is when the different Black student unions
translation.ko: 블랙 코커스는 윈체스터의 다양한 흑인 학생들이 모여

translation.en: at Winchester get together for a completely masturbatory
translation.ko: 블랙 코커스는 윈체스터의 다양한 흑인 학생들이 모여 단합이라는 위장 아래 완전히 자기도취적이고

translation.en: and pointless pissing contest under the guise of unity.
Held during lunchtime at Armstrong Parker once a month
translation.ko: 매달 한 번 점심때 암스트롱-파커에서 열리지

translation.en: because nobody wants to make room on their schedule.
-And we already eat here. -Is this off the record?
translation.ko: 우린 이미 여기서 점심 먹었어 - 이거 비공식적인 거야? - 얼마든지 인용해도 돼

translation.en: [Sam] You can quote us all you want.
translation.ko: - 이거 비공식적인 거야? - 얼마든지 인용해도 돼

translation.en: We got the Black Student Union, headed by me,
translation.ko: 내가 이끄는 흑인 학생 연합이 있지

translation.en: Winchester's first and only relevant group fighting for Black causes on campus.
translation.ko: 윈체스터 최초이자 유일한 흑인 인권 동아리야

translation.en: We got the African-American Student Union,
translation.ko: 아프리카계 미국인 학생 연합 일명 AASU도 있어

translation.en: or AASU, which basically does nothing
translation.ko: 아프리카계 미국인 학생 연합 일명 AASU도 있어 아무것도 안 하면서 BSU랑 같이 묻어가는 곳이야

translation.en: and takes credit for the work of the BSU.
translation.ko: 아무것도 안 하면서 BSU랑 같이 묻어가는 곳이야

translation.en: They claim mac and cheese Wednesdays, but we made that shit happen.
translation.ko: '맥 앤 치즈 수요일'을 자기들이 만들었다지만, 우리가 만든 거지

translation.en: Yes.
We got Black American Forum or Black AF. Mostly mediocre slam poets.
translation.ko: 블랙 아메리칸 포럼, AF는 평이한 시인들의 모임이야

translation.en: They make hashtags and T-shirts. -And throw dope parties. -Mm-hmm.
translation.ko: - 해시태그와 티셔츠를 만들지 - 대마초 파티도 열고

translation.en: -And then there's-- -[Troy] CORE.
The Coalition of Racial Equality.
And the only group here invited to sit at the dean's quarterly student council.
translation.ko: 학생처장님의 분기 학생회에 유일하게 초대된 동아리지

translation.en: Don't say "the dean" like he's not your father.
translation.ko: 너희 아버지 아닌 것처럼 '학생처장님'이라고 하지 마

translation.en: -Hi, Lionel. -Hi, Troy.
I trust your story's portrayal of these fine groups will go unbiased.
translation.ko: 이 훌륭한 동아리들의 기사를 편견 없이 써 줄 거지?

translation.en: -You got it, Troy. -[chuckles]
Some things never change. Some things do.
translation.ko: - 변하지 않는 게 있다니까 - 변하는 것도 있지

translation.en: Coco. CORE's new treasurer. Real name: Colandrea.
translation.ko: - 코코, 코어의 새 회계 담당이지 - 실명은 콜랜드리아

translation.en: C-o-l-a-n-d-r-e-a. For accuracy.
Don't do it with that mess atop your head you like to pass off as natural,
translation.ko: 그러지 마 네 머리에 신경 안 쓴 척하지도 말고

translation.en: held together by bobby pins and prayer?
-Lord. -You want to go there?
With half of India's GDP atop your head?
-Oh. -They kinda got beef.
translation.ko: 인도의 GDP만큼 머리핀 꽂아 볼래? - 서로 싫어해 - 눈치챘어

translation.en: -Picked that up. -We have nothing, sweets.
translation.ko: - 서로 싫어해 - 눈치챘어 우린 싫어하지 않아

translation.en: I happen to find her viewpoints to be little more than self-serving,
translation.ko: 난 샘의 관점이 좀 이기적이라고 느낄 뿐이야

translation.en: Blacker-than-thou propaganda.
Feel free to quote me, Lionel.
Yo, fam, can we cut the Love & Hip Hop auditions and get to it?
[man] Post-racial my ass.
Everyone said we were crying wolf, but this is our proof.
translation.ko: 다들 우리가 허풍을 친다고 하는데 바로 이게 증거야

translation.en: A bunch of white kids dressing up like us? I mean, this is some real shit.
translation.ko: 백인 애들이 우리처럼 옷을 입다니, 진짜 개판이야

translation.en: Yeah, guys, you know what this is?
translation.ko: 그래, 이게 뭔지 알아? 인종 차별이야

translation.en: -This is racism. -What a revelation, Kelsey.
translation.ko: 그래, 이게 뭔지 알아? 인종 차별이야 대단한 깨달음이다, 켈시 누가 좀 받아 적어

translation.en: Somebody should write this down. Paper boy, you got that?
translation.ko: 대단한 깨달음이다, 켈시 누가 좀 받아 적어 - 기자, 적었어? - 난 이런 일은

translation.en: [Kelsey] I thought this kind of thing
only happened in the '50s or in BuzzFeed articles.
translation.ko: 50년대 아니면 버즈피드에서나 볼 수 있는 건 줄 알았어

translation.en: I don't feel safe.
I'd like to use this meeting
to cull some thoughts that CORE can actually take to the dean.
translation.ko: 이 시간을 통해 생각을 선별해서 코어가 학생처장님께 전달했으면 해

translation.en: What the hell's the Coalish gonna do?
Y'all should let the BSU take lead
because we've been fighting these issues since jump.
translation.ko: 우린 이 문제로 계속 싸워 왔으니까

translation.en: [man] We need a march on campus, fam. -#Sinchester. -[man] Uh-huh.
translation.ko: 캠퍼스에서 행진을 하는 거야 해시태그 신체스터

translation.en: -#BlackFarceParty. -[woman] Yeah, yeah.
-#FuckThePolice! -[man] Uh-huh.
-[woman] Yeah. -That one's evergreen.
translation.ko: - 해시태그 경찰은 엿 먹어라 - 그래 - 죽이지? - 당연하지

translation.en: Damn straight. These kids amuse themselves by wearing Black bodies as costumes,
translation.ko: - 죽이지? - 당연하지 백인 애들이 흑인 분장을 하고 노는데 "새 사진에 태그되었습니다"

translation.en: and we're the only ones upset?
We got to bust this campus wide open. [woman] Yes, Brother Malcolm.
translation.ko: - 우리가 들고일어나야 돼 - 그래, 말콤 형제

translation.en: Just to play devs, all my white friends are talking about it.
translation.ko: 내 백인 친구들도 다 그 얘길 하고 있어

translation.en: -So all your friends? -[Kelsey] Yelling at people
translation.ko: 넌 백인 친구밖에 없잖아 이미 우리 편인 사람들한테 해시태그와 행진으로 싸움 걸자고?

translation.en: who are already on our side using hashtags and marches?
translation.ko: 이미 우리 편인 사람들한테 해시태그와 행진으로 싸움 걸자고?

translation.en: Cathartic though it may be,
translation.ko: "태그 경고!" 우릴 성난 애들로 볼 거야

translation.en: it just makes us look angry.
We are angry, Kelsey. So the AASU proposes we do nothing. [Troy] That's not what she said.
translation.ko: - 우린 성났어, 켈시 - AASU는 가만히 있자는 거야?

translation.en: [Kelsey] Pastiche are the bad guys.
-Let's go after them. -[Sam] For what?
-Their editor is Kurt Fletcher. -[cell phones buzzing] Son of the president.
Nothing is going to happen to him or Pastiche.
translation.ko: "태그 경고!" 그 애도, 패스티시도 멀쩡할 거야

translation.en: You know, in the real world,
kids are getting shot by cops for being Black.
translation.ko: 흑인이란 이유로 애들이 경찰한테 총을 맞아

translation.en: Voter rights are still being suppressed.
Our criminal justice system continues to propagate a new Jim Crow.
translation.ko: 우리 사법 시스템은 흑인 차별 제도를 퍼뜨리고 있어

translation.en: This isn't about a college magazine. This is about a movement.
translation.ko: 중요한 건 대학 잡지가 아니라 행동이야

translation.en: We're surrounded by the future leaders of this country,
translation.ko: 우리 주위엔 미래의 이 나라 리더들이 많고

translation.en: and we finally got their ear.
translation.ko: 드디어 그들이 귀를 기울이니 우리가 하고 싶은 말을 하자

translation.en: -So what do we want to say? -About what now?
translation.ko: 드디어 그들이 귀를 기울이니 우리가 하고 싶은 말을 하자 무슨 말?

translation.en: You just got tagged on this.
Miss Black Power over here dating white boys.
translation.ko: 흑인 인권 운동가가 백인을 사귀고 있네

translation.en: So... what y'all talking 'bout?
Pussy. Bitches.
Sam, I was saying nothing,
because it is none of my business what goes on behind your sheets.
translation.ko: 네 이불 속에서 무슨 일이 벌어지든 내가 알 바 아니니까

translation.en: It's "between your sheets," Rashid. [Rashid] I speak five languages.
You speak one, barely. Do not correct my English.
translation.ko: 넌 하나도 제대로 못 하면서 지적질하지 마

translation.en: [man mockingly] "Do not correct my English."
[Kelsey] Sam...
I'm happy if you're happy. Okay?
[Sam] What?
Nothing.
Talking shit behind my back? You're fucking someone behind mine.
translation.ko: - 나 몰래 내 욕했어? - 넌 나 몰래 누구랑 잤잖아

translation.en: He's my TA from doc class.
We went for drinks once over the summer,
translation.ko: 여름 방학 때 딱 한 번 술 마셨어

translation.en: and you know there ain't shit to do over the summer.
translation.ko: 여름 방학 땐 할 일이 없잖아

translation.en: You know what?
I'm happy for you, Sam. Don't do that, Jo. Not you.
I have to unpack my best friend having a secret bae.
translation.ko: 내 절친이 나 몰래 연애한다는 게 견디기 힘들어

translation.en: Secret or white? Both.
translation.ko: - 몰래 한 게? 백인이란 게? - 둘 다

translation.en: You know I'm biracial, so technically-- Look, don't.
You're not Rashida Jones biracial. You're Tracee Ellis Ross biracial.
translation.ko: 넌 라시다 존스 같은 혼혈이 아닌 트레이시 엘리스 같은 혼혈이야

translation.en: People think of you as Black. [sighs] This is why I didn't say shit.
translation.ko: - 사람들은 널 흑인으로 생각해 - 이래서 아무 말 안 한 거야

translation.en: No, you didn't say shit because you stay talking
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 늘 여자는 왜 남자 없이

translation.en: about how we can't give up on our men.
translation.ko: 못 사느냐고 했으니 말 안 했겠지

translation.en: Sam, we met in the comments section of that Medium article you wrote.
translation.ko: 우린 네가 쓴 기사의 코멘트 섹션에서 만났어

translation.en: "Don't Fall in Love with Your Oppressor:
A Black Girl's Guide to Love at Winchester."
That one got so many likes.
What's crazy is you got guys like Reggie wanting to drink your bathwater.
translation.ko: 레지 같은 남자애가 네 목욕물이라도 마실 기세야

translation.en: He's literally Dap from School Daze, but darker,
translation.ko: 피부만 더 검지 '스쿨 데이즈'의 댑과 똑같은데

translation.en: and you pass him up for Mackle-less?
I thought I knew who I was.
I thought I knew what I wanted, but when I'm with him, I don't know.
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 게 확실한 줄 알았는데 그와 있으면 모르겠어

translation.en: I... [sighs]
It's like a respite from everything.
We're goofy.
We reference obscure movies. We watch Game of Thrones.
translation.ko: 난해한 영화 얘길 하고 '왕좌의 게임'을 봐

translation.en: That shit with dragons set in the world
translation.ko: 난해한 영화 얘길 하고 '왕좌의 게임'을 봐 용들이 세상에 살고 노예를 빼면 흑인이 하나도 없는 드라마?

translation.en: where no one's Black except the slaves?
translation.ko: 용들이 세상에 살고 노예를 빼면 흑인이 하나도 없는 드라마?

translation.en: I've tried to break it off before, but he sends one text,
translation.ko: 끝내려고 했는데 그가 보낸 문자 때문에

translation.en: and I can't help but smile all day long. You hate smiling.
translation.ko: - 종일 웃음이 나왔어 - 너 웃는 거 싫어하잖아

translation.en: So this is a thing?
Yeah, this is a thing.
He looks like the white dude in the picture that comes with the frame.
translation.ko: 액자 사면 들어 있는 사진 속의 남자처럼 생겼더라

translation.en: He does.
Fuck. What you got?
It's just something I gotta handle.
So when are we gonna meet him?
She's not afraid of the truth. Why are you?
translation.ko: 저 애는 진실을 겁내지 않는데 넌 왜 겁내?

translation.en: [woman] Miss White, please take a seat.
So many showed.
Hey.
Don't want to bug, but I know you forget to eat.
translation.ko: 귀찮게 해서 미안한데 굶었을 것 같아서

translation.en: Holy shit.
Is this the party?
You okay?
"Hate it when bae leaves"?
Uh, yeah, I know. But, you know, uh, in my defense,
the use of "bae" was purely ironic.
You didn't think to ask before you posted that?
translation.ko: 그 사진 올리기 전에 물어볼 생각 못 했어?

translation.en: Um, I'm sorry.
Are you embarrassed? Gabe...
the best part of us is that it was just us.
translation.ko: 우리 사이의 가장 좋은 점은 우리만 안다는 거였는데

translation.en: Now I feel like I've got the entire Black Caucus in my bedroom.
translation.ko: 이젠 블랙 코커스 회원들이 전부 내 침실에 있는 듯해

translation.en: Could be kinda hot. Oh, okay.
-You're joking. -[sighs] I'm only a Millennial on paper.
translation.ko: - 그것도 섹시한데 - 그래, 농담하고 있네 난 종이 세대야

translation.en: I didn't realize that an Instagram post was a relationship stage to be navigated.
translation.ko: 인스타그램 포스팅이 연애 단계의 척도가 될 줄은 몰랐어

translation.en: -Well, it is. -Okay.
We can go slow.
I just want to go somewhere.
Don't. I don't know what you're talking about.
Don't Gosling-eye me. Who, this guy?
translation.ko: - 고슬링처럼 쳐다보지 마 - 누구? 이 남자?

translation.en: What are you doing tomorrow night?
What do you got?
[Sam] What are you wearing?
What are you talking about? We're gonna watch a TV show.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 드라마 볼 거잖아 "블레이키 대학원 기숙사"

translation.en: [Sam] Not just a TV show.
Defamation Wednesdays are the epicenter of Black college life.
Okay.
-Don't you have some Js? -Oh.
Wait, are you trying to My Fair Lady me for your Black friends?
translation.ko: 흑인 친구들 앞에서 날 '마이 페어 레이디'로 만들려고?

translation.en: A little.
Oh, so in this instance, you want me to appropriate your culture.
translation.ko: 내가 너희 문화에 적응하길 바라는 거구나

translation.en: No, I--
-That's-- -Coming?
Oh, God. Since when do you even wear sweatpants?
[Gabe] I wear them all the time. You're always taking 'em off of me.
Well, shit, Sam, if I knew you liked 'em light, I woulda hollered.
translation.ko: 젠장, 네가 백인을 좋아하는 줄 알았으면 내가 도전할걸

translation.en: Hey, I'm Gabe.
translation.ko: "난 못 해" - 안녕? 난 게이브야 - 조엘이야

translation.en: Joelle.
You listen to me, and you listen very carefully.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어요 귀 기울이고 잘 들어요

translation.en: Yes!
Yes, coat. And the boots.
[woman] You do not own me.
translation.ko: 당신은 내 주인이 아니고 난 당신 소유물이 아니에요

translation.en: I am not your property. You do not look.
translation.ko: 당신은 내 주인이 아니고 난 당신 소유물이 아니에요 쳐다보지도, 만지지도 말고 더듬지도 마요!

translation.en: You do not touch. You do not grope.
And you definitely do not pinch my ass
at the White House Correspondents' Dinner.
-[woman] Yes! -[indistinct chatter]
[woman] He's cheating.
Well, you don't seem to mind any other time.
There were cameras there.
Roland Martin was a mere two feet away,
and we all know how he loves to blast people on Twitter.
I'm still in therapy from the last time I was trending.
translation.ko: 지난번 일 때문에 난 아직도 상담받고 있어요

translation.en: -But I'm in love with you. -[man] You better tell him.
Mm-hmm.
You are the leader of the free world. You don't get to fall in love.
translation.ko: 당신은 자유 세계의 리더예요 사랑에 빠질 여유 따위 없다고요

translation.en: And what about you?
I'm in love with my job,
which is to get little bitch babies like you to act like grown-ass men
translation.ko: 당신처럼 징징대는 아기들을 어른처럼 행동하게 만들어서

translation.en: when the world needs them to do their job.
translation.ko: 세상에 필요한 일을 하도록 하는 거죠!

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -That's my girl.
'Cause she gotta say something to him, right?
-I mean... -Well, I've got a job for you.
translation.ko: 할 말은 해야지, 그렇지? 임무를 주겠어

translation.en: Blow me. Right here in the Oval Office.
translation.ko: 입으로 해 줘! 바로 여기, 대통령 집무실의

translation.en: On that eagle!
Oh, hell no.
Yes, Mr. President.
-No! -[all] Oh! [Joelle] What? Are you serious?
I pledge allegiance to your cock.
-Wow. Wow. Wow. -She nasty.
Daddy?
-I can't. -Okay, wait, wait.
-So who is that? -That's her father.
translation.ko: - 못 보겠다 - 잠깐, 저게 누구야? 여자 아버지

translation.en: Well, actually a clone of her father who works undercover for the CIA
after her real father's untimely death. Provided the perfect cover.
translation.ko: 진짜 아버지는 갑자기 죽어서 아무도 몰라

translation.en: That's a little, uh-- that's a little far-fetched.
[Rashid] Does every American show revolve around fellatio-related cliffhangers?
translation.ko: 모든 미국 드라마는 구강성교와 관련된 결말로 궁금증을 유발하나?

translation.en: Hey, it's in our Constitution.
Black lives are degraded without regard, and we in here watching TV.
translation.ko: 흑인들은 모욕당하고 있는데 우린 TV나 보고 있고

translation.en: This is how the revolution dies.
Hey, I was thinking we should have a sit-in.
Maybe in Bechet's dining hall?
Where the white legacy kids live? [Sam] Exactly.
translation.ko: - 부잣집 백인들이 사는 곳에서? - 바로 그거야

translation.en: Engage the part of the student body that has the luxury of ignoring us.
translation.ko: 우릴 무시해 왔던 애들한테 노출되는 거지

translation.en: Not everything we do has to be geared toward white people, Sam.
translation.ko: 우리가 하는 모든 일을 백인들에게 맞출 필요 없어

translation.en: Hey, is this about the party? [Reggie] Nah.
We planning to protest the library. Too many books in that motherfucker.
translation.ko: 도서관 반대 운동을 할 거야 그 빌어먹을 곳에 책이 너무 많아

translation.en: You know, in 2017, I can't believe something like this could happen.
Really? 'Cause I can.
I mean, it's almost like you and I attend two totally separate schools.
translation.ko: 우린 서로 다른 학교에 다니는 거나 마찬가지야

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm just as pissed off as you are.
-Not possible. -[Gabe] No, uh--
Look, that's not what I meant.
Bro, just because you got a Black chick on your arm
translation.ko: 이봐, 흑인 여자를 안고 있다는 이유만으로

translation.en: doesn't mean you get to Miley Cyrus our pain, a'ight?
translation.ko: 우리의 고통을 없애 줄 수 있다고 생각하지는 마

translation.en: Reggie. Chill. [Gabe] No, no, no. No, no, look.
You're absolutely right. I have no idea how you feel.
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞아 난 네 심정 전혀 몰라

translation.en: But I want to.
Look, I'm Gabe. Why are you even here?
translation.ko: - 난 게이브야 - 여긴 왜 온 거야?

translation.en: What are you gonna do, hit me?
It might surprise you,
but I don't use my fists to solve problems.
Hit you?
Nigga, I should hit you for thinking that I would hit you.
translation.ko: 내가 널 때릴 거란 생각을 한 이유로 널 때려 줘야겠다

translation.en: You know what?
It's not worth it.
Ga--
Sam... I'm sorry.
Everything that's going-- Sam.
-[Joelle] Sam, you okay? -[woman] Turn it up.
translation.ko: - 모든 게... 샘 - 샘, 괜찮아? 소리 좀 키워!

translation.en: [woman on TV] Daddy? But I buried you on Tuesday.
Holla if you need me, girl!
Ooh, shit!
Hey, are you all right?
Yeah, I'm fine. I'm sorry to embarrass you in front of all your friends.
translation.ko: - 이봐, 괜찮아? - 응 네 친구들 앞에서 무안하게 해서 미안해

translation.en: Oh, so you felt like the odd man out for two minutes.
translation.ko: 2분 동안 이상한 사람이 된 것 같았구나

translation.en: Guess what. I feel like that every day on this campus.
translation.ko: 난 매일같이 캠퍼스에서 그런 기분을 느껴

translation.en: Yes, society sucks, but I would never let my friends
translation.ko: 그래, 이 사회는 재수 없어 하지만 난 절대 내 친구들이

translation.en: make you feel you didn't belong in my world.
Oh, and don't worry. I'm gonna delete the post.
translation.ko: 걱정 마 포스팅한 거 지울 테니까

translation.en: Sam?
Can we talk?
translation.ko: "비꼬는 코멘트 로드 중" 얘기 좀 할래?

translation.en: Wait, you hacked into Dean Fairbanks' computer?
That's a thing that can happen?
Some CS major ran a redirected shell script,
translation.ko: 컴퓨터 공학과 애들이 셸 스크립트를 변경하고

translation.en: analyzed the active network interface, and routed...
Yes, it's a thing that can happen.
What's this got to do with me?
Sam...
we have hard evidence that someone broke into Pastiche's Facebook account
translation.ko: 우리에겐 누군가가 패스티시의 페이스북 계정에 침입해서

translation.en: and sent out an invite for the blackface party.
translation.ko: 블랙페이스 파티의 초대장을 보냈다는 확실한 증거가 있어

translation.en: Shit.
My editor wants to run with the story as soon as possible, but...
translation.ko: 편집장은 최대한 빨리 기사를 내자고 하는데

translation.en: if someone else breaks it before we do...
You know? You'd ruin your own scoop?
I guess I just don't like the idea of telling someone else's truth.
translation.ko: 난 그냥 다른 사람의 진실을 폭로한다는 사실이 싫어

translation.en: Sam! I'm so glad you're here.
I just need you to leave immediately.
What are you talking about? What's she doing here?
translation.ko: 무슨 말이야? 쟤는 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: Listen, I'm just filling your time slot with Dear Abigail
until this whole blackface controversy blows over.
Dear Abigail? I'm getting complaints from all over.
translation.ko: - 고민 상담 코너? - 각지에서 불만이 들어오고 있어

translation.en: I've had trolls since day one.
Okay, people just don't get how you can have a show called Dear White People
translation.ko: 사람들은 네가 '친애하는 백인 여러분'이란 쇼를 진행하면서

translation.en: and then complain about a party called Dear Black People.
translation.ko: '친애하는 흑인 여러분'이란 파티를 욕하는 걸 이해 못 해

translation.en: If I hear "reverse racism" one more time--
Reverse racism? -Really? -Yeah.
I get it. -You were just doing your job. -Thank you.
translation.ko: - 네가 할 일을 하는 건 알겠어 - 고맙다

translation.en: Well, would you mind if I read some of the complaints?
Sure, yeah, yeah. Come to my office.
I could not believe there's so many racists on this campus.
translation.ko: 캠퍼스에 인종차별주의자가 이렇게 많다니 기가 막혀 - 맞아 - 알면 알수록 말야

translation.en: The more you know, right?
I guess you know. You must get this all the time.
translation.ko: - 너도 알겠지 - 그럼 너도 늘 받아 봤겠지 이봐!

translation.en: -Hey, hey! -[Abigail] ...a very bad roommate
translation.ko: 너도 늘 받아 봤겠지 이봐! 1학년 때 룸메이트가 진짜 끔찍했어요

translation.en: my freshman year.
-[Sam] You? Out. -Okay.
-Yeah, excuse me. -Okay. Sorry.
Dear white people, wow.
Y'all really trying it.
I get that being reduced to a race-based generalization
is a new and devastating experience for some of you,
translation.ko: 새롭고 가슴 아픈 경험인 분들도 있나 본데

translation.en: but here's the difference.
My jokes don't incarcerate your youth at alarming rates
translation.ko: 내 농담은 백인 청소년을 높은 상승세로 감옥에 보내거나

translation.en: or make it unsafe for you to walk around your own neighborhoods.
translation.ko: 여러분이 동네를 다닐 때 불안감을 느끼게 하진 않지만

translation.en: But yours do.
When you mock or belittle us, you enforce an existing system.
translation.ko: 우릴 조롱하고 무시하며 여러분은 기존의 시스템을 강화하죠

translation.en: Cops everywhere staring down the barrel of a gun at a Black man
translation.ko: 사방에서 흑인에게 총구를 겨누고 노려보는 경찰들에겐

translation.en: don't see a human being.
They see a caricature...
a thug...
A nigger. A nigger.
So... nah!
You don't get to show up in a Halloween costume version of us
translation.ko: 여러분은 우릴 흉내 낸 핼러윈 의상을 입고 나타나

translation.en: and claim irony or ignorance,
translation.ko: 아이러니니, 무지니 하며 항변할 수 없어요

translation.en: not anymore.
Before this party... a POC on this campus
translation.ko: 이 파티가 있기 전엔 이 캠퍼스에선

translation.en: couldn't even think the word "racism" without being accused of crying wolf.
But just like it took a Sandra Bland,
a Trayvon Martin,
and a Philando Castile to wake some folks up,
translation.ko: 필란도 캐스틸의 희생으로 일부 시민들이 깨어난 것처럼

translation.en: this party is what it took to wake this campus up.
translation.ko: 이 파티로 우리 캠퍼스가 깨어날 것입니다

translation.en: Look.
I sent the invite.
I wrote it.
Broke into Pastiche's account and sent it.
It was fascinating to see what was lurking beneath the surface
when you were given an excuse to suspend
your polite, passive liberalism.
I considered it a sociological experiment.
And guess what. You proved my point.
translation.ko: 내 생각이 옳다는 걸 여러분이 증명해 줬어요

translation.en: Winchester, we got a problem.
Oh, one more thing.
To Gabe Mitchell, I'm sorry.
Please forgive me.
#HateItWhen bae's mad.
-[woman] I should say that to my roommate? -[cell phone buzzes]
All she did was leave a wet towel on my bed.
translation.ko: 사실 내 침대 위에 젖은 타월을 놓았을 뿐이죠

translation.en: You know, I'll try it.
translation.ko: "바로 그거야! - 레지" 노력해 볼게요 "넌 여신이야, 브라보 - 알"

translation.en: -Thanks, Abigail. -[clicks]
